welcome_message_body: Welcome to Youngstown, where charm and history meet in this bustling city. Explore our vibrant arts scene, rich cultural heritage, and delicious local cuisine. Enjoy your time here and make unforgettable memories!

restaurants.name: Cassese's MVR
restaurants.description: Cassese's MVR is a italian restaurant located in Youngstown.
restaurants.address: 410 N Walnut St (at Webb St), Youngstown, OH 44505

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Youngstown Airport handles all commercial flights and services.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Youngstown Airport caters to private and corporate aircrafts.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Beaver Falls Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is reserved for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
